title: How to use Gboard’s Emoji Kitchen on Android
content:
If you ever thought that the current list of premade emojis out there was too restrictive, then you’re in luck. Gboard has a feature set called the Emoji Kitchen, wherein you can combine emojis to make some interesting hybrids. This guide will take you through how to do exactly that.

more…

The post How to use Gboard’s Emoji Kitchen on Android appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Did you know you could create some insane emoji combinations with Gboard's Emoji Kitchen. Well, we did, and we'd love to show you how use it.
